stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.

preGame: Greetings, boils and ghouls! Step right up to the edge of your seats because we are coming to you live from the soggy, sinking, and absolutely spectacular Serpent's Pass! I'm your host, Nok the Corrupter, and boy oh boy, do we have a humdinger for you today! It is the final week of the regular season, and the air is thick with the smell of swamp gas and anticipation! Our home team, the Zmeigorod Snessengers, are the talk of the realm! Everyone from the Bog Queen Valos to the common muck-dweller is out today to support these serpentine superstars. On the other side of the field, we have the New Monteforte Chaos Creatures, led by that dirt-wizard Dame Terra Monteforte. They might not have the crowd on their side, but they've got enough grit to fill a quarry! üèüÔ∏èüêçThe rituals are underway and they are a sight to behold! I just saw Waldon Tadeo rubbing some truly foul-smelling mushrooms on her elbows‚Äîthat's the kind of dedication to flexibility I love to see! Meanwhile, Delija Dowling is chugging raw eggs, shell and all! Over in the Chaos Creatures' camp, Lian Denton is knocking back a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup, and Wolbrom Ariella is treating us to a sea shanty that is so out of tune it might actually be a form of psychological warfare! It is wet, it is wild, and the altitude is already making the players' lungs burn! Whether it's the rockslides or the sudden downpours, something is going to break today, and I hope it's a femur! Let‚Äôs get ready for some Trollball! üèàüíÄ
postGame: What a magnificent display of carnage we witnessed today at the Serpent's Pass! The Zmeigorod Snessengers didn't just win; they orchestrated a symphony of destruction that would make even Geth the Gravelord weep with joy! The final score stands at a dominant 4 to 0 in favor of the home team, and the crowd is absolutely losing their minds in the swamp! It was a masterpiece of violence from the very first whistle! üêçüèÜThe action kicked off with Delija Dowling snatching up the leather head, but the real fireworks started when Arni Griffith absolutely flattened Placido Kora! The medical tents were overflowing before the first ten minutes were up! We saw Northway Orran and Evalyn Pierrepont handing out injuries like they were holiday gifts, sending Mouldon Earl and Alben Diantha to the sidelines for some much-needed reconstruction! üè•üí•The Chaos Creatures tried to fight back, with Gabriele Klehm pulling off a spectacular interception from Alded Sanjay, but they just couldn't find the basket! It seems kissing the Trollball for luck doesn't help much when you're being hunted by Machete-wielding maniacs! The altitude and the sinking turf clearly played a factor, as the Chaos Creatures looked like they were running through molasses while the Snessengers moved like greased lightning! ‚ö°üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èJust when things looked like they might settle down, Northway Orran decided she had seen enough of the scrum! From the 'Away 2-Point' zone, she launched a beautiful shot that sailed through the air and through the goal! Two points on the board just like that! It was a throw so precise it would make Sir Tanos' head spin, assuming he could read the scoreboard! üéØüî•The second half was even bloodier! Raouf Dragone and Gabriele Klehm tried to lead a comeback, but the Snessengers' defense was a brick wall. Avaria Revell and Kleinstein MacGregor were absolutely relentless, knocking Chaos Creatures out left and right! At one point, we almost had a forfeit because the Creatures had so few players left standing! It was beautiful, pure Trollball chaos! üå™Ô∏èü©∏Alded Sanjay put the nail in the coffin later in the game, sinking another massive 2-point shot from distance! The Chaos Creatures were left reeling, their aesthetically pleasing gear spirals ruined and their sea shanties silenced. Even the interceptions by Dare Wynnie and Fogel Raynold couldn't stem the tide of Zmeigorod's overwhelming popularity and power! üåäüö´I have to wonder if the 'heroes' of the realm are watching this? While people like Cinnemon are busy spreading the curse of literacy, these warriors are out here doing the real work of breaking bones and taking names! If only the Haven Lights had half the backbone shown by these Snessengers today, maybe they wouldn't be such a disappointment! üôÑüí©The Chaos Creatures had their chances, with Boulanger Procto and Raouf Dragone getting close to the goal, but their shots just wouldn't find the mark. Perhaps if they spent less time telling jokes to the ball and more time practicing their aim, the scoreline wouldn't be so lopsided! But hey, that's the beauty of the game! ü§°üìâAs the sun sets over the swamp and the stadium continues its slow descent into the muck, the Zmeigorod Snessengers stand tall! They are heading into the playoffs with all the momentum of a rockslide! The fans are cheering, the mead is flowing, and the Bog Queen herself must be grinning ear to ear! Zmeigorod is the place to be, folks! ü•≥üêçFinal thought for the night: If you're going to lose, at least lose with enough injuries to make the healers work for their pay! The Chaos Creatures certainly did that, even if they forgot how to score! We'll see you all for the playoffs, where the stakes are higher and the hits are harder! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from a very wet, very bloody Serpent's Pass! Goodnight and stay corrupted! üéôÔ∏èüëπ
